page.title: 03INDUSTRY AND EMPLOYMENT Cont
page.content: available buildings.These are located on industrial estates. The first industrial estate was Chase Park,which was originally an R.A.F. supply depot. There are forty-six firms that employ 750 males and 397 females.Sixteen of these firms are "BREDA" units which are independant workplaces.Most people how ever,commute to nearby towns to work as Burntwood is an unemployment blackspot. In a survey of local people,of those interviewed seventy-five percent worked outside Burntwood.The most common "out of town workplace" being Birmingham(18% of total).Even though Burntwood is of equal size to Lichfield,few nationally known firms have located here.The best known being Fletcher's International Power Boats who distribute worldwide.
